All Classes

Class Description
AlreadyExistingPlayerException
thrown when you try to insert a player that he's already in the game
ANSIColors  
Apollo
Apollo Card implementation.
Artemis
Artemis Card implementation.
Athena
Athena Card implementation.
Atlas
Artemis Card implementation.
BehaviourManager
The BehaviourManager class store the information about what actions the Player can do during his turn.
BlockTypeEnum
Enum of building blocks
BoardManager
A class containing the main info about the game, such as the island, the list of the players and the cards, to make them easy accessible from the controller package
BoardSceneController
This class handle the entire match using the Pattern State.
Card
Generic abstract class for Gods Cards.
CardEnum
Enum with all the card info
CardUtility
static methods that help printing a list of cards
CC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent
Event sent by the VirtualView to the Controller to make a connection request for a player.
CC_NewGameResponseEvent
Event sent to the controller when a game has just finished.
CellCluster
This class represents the single cell of the board game
CellClusterData
this class represents a model CellCluster
Chronus
Chronus Card implementation.
CLI
CLI version of the MVC View, it handles incoming events, displays messages, reads input, and sends events as an EventSource.
ClientHandler
server thread that handles the client connection and socket read/write methods
ClientMain
Server program entry point
ClientSocket
This class is the process that reads and writes using the socket, sending and receiving events from the server.
Command
a command that is inserted into the CLI during a match
CommandGameState
Handle all the user interactions like OnBoard Clicks or Buttons.
ControllerGameEvent
Generic event sent by the client to the Controller
ControllerListener
Interface implemented by classes of the controller that need to handle the events sent by the client
CV_CardChoiceRequestGameEvent
Event sent by the controller to the client when the player has to choose a card.
CV_ChallengerChooseFirstPlayerRequestEvent
Event sent by the controller to the client when the challenger has to choose the player that has to begins (after the cards selection).
CV_ChallengerChosenEvent
Event sent by the controller to the client when the challenger has to choose the cards.
CV_CommandExecutedGameEvent
Event sent by the server to the client when a command is actually executed.
CV_CommandRequestEvent
Event sent by the Controller to the client when the server expect a command from the user.
CV_ConnectionRejectedErrorGameEvent
Event sent by the Controller to the client saying that the connection has not established.
CV_GameErrorGameEvent
Event sent by the controller to the client when an error has occurred during the actual game.
CV_GameOverEvent
Event sent by the controller to the client when the game is over.
CV_GameStartedGameEvent
Event to notify the client that the game is started.
CV_IslandUpdateEvent
Event sent by the controller to the client when an action has made by a player.
CV_NewGameRequestEvent
Event sent by the Controller to the client asking for a new game after one has just finished.
CV_NewTurnEvent
Event sent by the controller to the client when a new turn begins.
CV_PlayerPlaceWorkerRequestEvent
Event sent by the controller to the client when the player has to place a worker.
CV_PreGameErrorGameEvent
Event sent by the controller to the client when an error during the pre game occurs.
CV_PreGameStartedGameEvent
Event to notify the client that the pre game is started.
CV_ReconnectionRejectedErrorGameEvent
Event sent by the Controller that occurs when a reconnection after a game has just finished was not successful.
CV_RoomSizeRequestGameEvent
Event sent by the Controller to the client asking to input the size of the room to create.
CV_RoomUpdateGameEvent
Event sent by the controller to the client when the player or another player enters in the room he is in.
CV_SpectatorGameEvent
Event sent by the server when a player loses for first in a 3-player game and he becomes a spectator.
CV_TurnInfoEvent
Event sent by the controller to the player of the turn containing the info about what actions he has remaining in this turn.
CV_WaitMatchGameEvent
Event sent by the controller to the client saying what is happening.
CV_WaitPreMatchGameEvent
Event sent by the controller to the client when is another player turn saying why the player has to wait.
CV_WorkerPlacementGameEvent
Event sent when the worker placement phase starts.
DefeatException
thrown when someone is defeated (For example there isn't a worker he can move)
Demeter
Demeter Card implementation.
ErrorPopUp
Class that loads the ErrorScene to show the error messages to the player
ErrorSceneController
Controls the ErrorScene for displaying error messages received from the server
EventListener
Generic interface implemented by the classes that need to handle events.
EventSource
an observable objects that generates events notifying all the attached listeners
GameEvent  
GameStateAbstract
Interface that implements pattern State with all methods to handle the interaction by the user and updates from the server.
GUI
Main GUI class with JavaFX scenes and controllers.
Hephaestus
Hephaestus Card implementation.
Hera
Hera Card implementation.
Hestia
Hestia Card implementation.
InvalidBuildException  
InvalidCardException
thrown when you select a card that is not valid, for example because it's not in the available cards list
InvalidMovementException
thrown when an invalid movement attempt has been made
Island
This class represents the board game with the matrix of CellCluster
IslandData
this class represents a model Island using a matrix of CellClusterData
IslandUtility
utility class that displays an Island using data from IslandData
ListenerType  
Lobby
Handle the connections to the game, create the Rooms and start PreGame and Game, implements the Singleton Pattern.
LobbySceneController
Controller of LobbyScene, receives Room updates from the server and handle this updates
Message
Used to diplay message
MessageUtility
static methods to print messages into the CLI
Minotaur
Minotaur Card implementation.
NotFreeRoomAvailableException
thrown when trying to add a player with no available rooms in the lobby
OutcomeSceneController
Last scene of a game with the info about who won and who lose and the menu to what to do after a game
Pan
Pan Card implementation.
PingEvent
An event sent by both the client and the server.
PlaceWorkerGameState
Worker Placement state class implementation that handle the placement of the workers.
Player
This class represents a player in the model and contains player info and card.
PlayerDisconnectedViewEvent
Event sent when a player disconnects, used to notify the other clients that a player is disconnected and that the connection to server will close
PreGameController
This class handles the event and sets the information of the pregame phase of a game: the choice of the challenger, the placement of the workers, and choice of the first player.
PreGameSceneController
This class handle the choose of the Cards and the choose of the first player, loading all the cards and the player dynamically.
Prometheus
Prometheus Card implementation, part of the implementation is located in the controller.
Range
auxiliary class that represents a natural numbers range between low and high (including upper and lower bounds)
Room
This class contains the Player and handle the game during the change of the phases.
RoomNotFoundException
thrown during the client disconnection process when a room it's not found
RoomSizeSceneController
Controls the scene of the choice of the room size
RoomUtility
Utilities about room used in CLI
SantoriniServer
Starting class for the Server that create the instance of Lobby and accept each client creating a new Thread to handle the requests.
SpectatorGameState
Spectator State class implementation.
StartingSceneController
The controller of the starting scene, the scene where the client creates the connection with the server
Triton
Triton Card implementation.
Turn
This class contains all the info of the specific turn of the player
TurnAction
All available actions during a single turn
TurnController
This class filters VirtualView events, it creates a turn(on model) for current player and manages it.
TurnStateEnum  
UserDisconnectedException  
UserNotFoundException
thrown when trying to find a user in a room but the user doesn't exists
VC_ChallengerCardsChosenEvent
Event sent by the client to the server when the challenger has chosen the cards.
VC_ChallengerChosenFirstPlayerEvent
Event sent by the client to the server
VC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent
Event sent by the client to the server to request a connection.
VC_NewGameResponseEvent
Event sent by the client to the server responding to a CV_NewGameRequestEvent saying if he wants or not to play another game.
VC_PlayerCardChosenEvent
Event sent by the client to the server responding to a CV_CardChoiceRequestGameEvent when the player has to choose his card.
VC_PlayerCommandGameEvent
Event sent by the client to the server reponding to a CV_CommandRequestEvent.
VC_PlayerPlacedWorkerEvent
Event sent by the client to the server responding to a CV_PlayerPlaceWorkerRequestEvent when the player has to place a worker.
VC_RoomSizeResponseGameEvent
Event sent by the client to the server responding to a CV_RoomSizeRequestGameEvent.
ViewGameEvent
Generic event sent by the Controller to the view
ViewListener
Interface implemented by classes of the view that need to handle the events sent by the server
VirtualView
Virtual View class, it simulates the View in the Server side and each client has associated an unique instance of this class.
WaitGameState
Wait State class implementation.
WinningException
thrown when someone wins the match
Worker
Worker class with info about the owner
Worker.IDs
Worker ID (A or B)
WorkerColors
Colors assigned to the players
WorkerLockedException  
WorkerStatus
Class used to handle the status of the worker (selection, movement and build) during the game phase.
Zeus
Zeus Card implementation.
